org.activebpel.rt.util
Class AeConsoleLogHandler

java.lang.Object
  java.util.logging.Handler
      org.activebpel.rt.util.AeConsoleLogHandler
public class AeConsoleLogHandler
extends java.util.logging.Handler

Logging handler that will write messages to the system console. If the message is at Warning level, it will be surrounded by asterisks.
